item.title: Adding Metafields to Product Variants
item.description: B y By using metaafields we can store extra information on products, collections, customers, orders, blogs, pages and your shop. Then, you can use the metafields object to display the information on you website pages using simple Liquid code. The easiest way to add metafields is by using an app, such as Metafields Guru. It is possible to add metafields without an app using the bulk editor, here’s how. A metafield consists of a namespace, a key, a value, and an optional description.
